mapper.select: select * from t_tree p left join t_role_power rp on p.id=rp.powerid left join t_user_role ur on rp.roleid=ur.roleid where ur.userid=#{userid} and p.pid =#{pid} and p.flag="menu" group by p.id
select r.premission from t_role r left join t_user_role ur on r.roleid=ur.roleid where ur.userid=#{id} group by r.roleid

select u.permission from t_user_role ur left join t_role_power rp on ur.roleid=rp.roleid left join t_tree u on rp.powerid=u.id where ur.userid=#{id} and u.permission is not null and u.permission !='' GROUP BY u.id
select u.*,GROUP_CONCAT(r.rolename) as rolename from t_user u left join t_user_role ur on u.id=ur.userid left join t_role r on ur.roleid=r.roleid group by u.id
mapper.update: update t_user set name=#{name},pwd=#{pwd} where id=#{id}
update t_user set pwd=#{pwd} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select u.*,GROUP_CONCAT(ur.roleid) roleid from t_user u left join t_user_role ur on u.id=ur.userid where u.id=#{userid} group by u.id
select * from t_tree t left join t_role_power r on t.id=r.powerid where r.roleid=#{roleid}
